за последние 24 часа профиль просмотрен: for the last 24 hours this profile was watched
Фильтры контента - это функция, которая: Content filters - is a function which gives you an opportunity to activate a content selection on the site (groups, peoples, meetings and e.t.c) by using your profile settings (for example - interests, marks, activity). Enabling this function you should realise that the count of the content on the site will be decreased but the chance to find something usefull or uninterested content will be very small.
Хотите добавить свою композицию?: Whould you like to add new composition?
Ваш вкус совпадает с пользователями: Your musical flavor are matched with users

Если Вы хотите сохранить событие в закла: If you want to save some event in your marked list you should go to the 'Events' page, choose the category and some event from the events list and then click the 'I will go' button
У вас пока нет событий в закладках: You dont dont have any events in your marked list
У Вас нет пользователей в закладках: You dont have any users in your marks
Чтобы добавить пользователя в закладки,: If u want to add some user into your marked list you should go to his profile and click the 'Mark as important' button
Интересы - это критерий для поиска людей: Interests - is a criterion for searching people. With the help of this criterion you can understand is there any matches between you and other user of our site. By default we are offering you a small list of interests. You can set it up in you profile (example below)
В чем цель встречи?: What is the purpose of the meeting?
Здесь указаны все интересы, которые могу: Here is the list of interests which can be used on the site

Вы должны загрузить 2 файла: картинку и: You should load 2 files: image and any music file
Пожалуйста, учитывайте, что при выборе я: You should realise that when u change the language only a few parts of interface elements will be translated (notifications, hints, titles, modal windows and e.t.c). Content part of our site which created by other users (posts, news, comments and e.t.c.) will not be translated.
Вы можете приглашать пользователей на ме: You can invite users to the events. This users must be in your marked list. To add some user to marked list you should go to his profile and click the 'Invite' button.
